name: Space Save!
description:
Hello Solider

Today We have a SOS mission and It is very very very very toooooooooop secret!!

We have a Universal Space Station aka USS is a Space Station which has all the organisms found in the UNIVERSE!!! To Protect Universe

Unfortunately, In USS there was a sudden oxygen leak which made all the crewmates escape the Space Station which Escape pod but the Escape pod doesn't have PARACHUTE to safely land in the earth 

So your mission is Catch the Humans and save the space!!

So Get ready to be saved by Space!!!!!!!

A game by Random Ideation Studios!

Note : To go back to Main Menu, Just press ESC
